movies.title: They Shall Not Grow Old
movies.plot: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.

movies.title: Midnight Family
movies.actors: Fer Ochoa, Josue Ochoa, Juan Ochoa
movies.plot: In Mexico City's wealthiest neighborhoods, the Ochoa family runs a private ambulance, competing with other for-profit EMTs for patients in need of urgent help.

movies.title: Pain & Gain
movies.writer: Christopher Markus (screenplay), Stephen McFeely (screenplay), Pete Collins (based on the magazine articles by)
movies.actors: Mark Wahlberg, Dwayne Johnson, Anthony Mackie, Tony Shalhoub
movies.plot: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.actors: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci, Harvey Keitel
movies.plot: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.
movies.awards: Nominated for 5 Golden Globes. Another 35 wins & 159 nominations.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt, Margot Robbie, Emile Hirsch
movies.plot: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the film industry during the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.
movies.awards: Won 3 Golden Globes. Another 70 wins & 242 nominations.

movies.title: Marriage Story
movies.actors: Adam Driver, Scarlett Johansson, Julia Greer, Azhy Robertson
movies.plot: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.
movies.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 86 wins & 212 nominations.

movies.title: Little Women
movies.actors: Winona Ryder, Gabriel Byrne, Trini Alvarado, Samantha Mathis
movies.plot: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 15 nominations.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.writer: Bong Joon Ho (story), Bong Joon Ho (screenplay), Bong Joon Ho (story by), Jin Won Han (screenplay)
movies.actors: Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Yeo-jeong Jo, Woo-sik Choi
movies.plot: All unemployed, Ki-taek and his family take peculiar interest in the wealthy and glamorous Parks, as they ingratiate themselves into their lives and get entangled in an unexpected incident.
movies.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 119 wins & 179 nominations.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.actors: Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, Jamie Lee Curtis
movies.plot: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 22 wins & 37 nominations.

movies.title: Dolemite Is My Name
movies.actors: Eddie Murphy, Keegan-Michael Key, Mike Epps, Craig Robinson
movies.plot: Eddie Murphy portrays real-life legend Rudy Ray Moore, a comedy and rap pioneer who proved naysayers wrong when his hilarious, obscene, kung-fu fighting alter ego, Dolemite, became a 1970s Blaxploitation phenomenon.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 17 wins & 54 nominations.
